intro.title: Introduction
intro.description: I'm a Fullstack Lead Developer based in Paris, specialized in building modern web applications, robust microservices, and high-performance software architectures. I'm passionate about technology and innovation and strive to stay updated with the latest software development trends. My expertise includes technologies like Spring Boot, Kotlin, Java, React, and more. I'm also a strong advocate for best development practices such as TDD, DDD, and Agile methodologies.

LuxuryLeader.role: Fullstack Lead Dev, Spring Boot (Kotlin/Java) & React
LuxuryLeader.achievements: Technical leadership of a squad of 5 developers;Cross-team technical guidance (choices, trade-offs, best practices);Organization and animation of technology watch across squads;Onboarding of new developers;Implementation and enforcement of best practices (clean code, reviews, methodologies);Technical documentation and diagramming (architecture, flows, components);Development of web, mobile (PWA), and logistics microservices in React & Spring Boot;Creation of internal tools (SDKs, libraries, starters);Production support for applications;Technical ownership of critical applications and microservices

TakimaRH.achievements: Developed Hui application for HR event management.;Split Hui from the Itewa application.;Wrote SQL scripts for new data schema.;Developed SAP synchronization CRON jobs.;Integrated with Google Sheets via API.;Developed unit and integration tests.

TakimaFormation.achievements: 10-week intensive internship covering 13 fullstack development chapters.;Topics included: Java, Kotlin, Spring, React, DevOps, TDD, CI/CD, REST, etc.;Built a fullstack marketplace.;Learned agile methodologies and best development practices.

Atos.achievements: Built an internal PWA for mission tracking in Angular & Spring Boot.;Gathered user needs through interviews.;Handled complete design (mockups, data models, architecture).;Fullstack development and security with Spring Security.;Implemented backend tests and password encryption.;Worked autonomously through the entire project cycle: analysis, development, deployment.
